bibl.title: In the Matter of the application of Ah Chon for a writ of Habeas Corpus. Order
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

msIdentifier.repository: Washington State Archives, Eastern Regional Branch
msIdentifier.collection: Walla Walla County Government; Clerk, Territorial Court Civil/Criminal Case Files, 1860-1889

div1.p: In the matter of the application of Ah Chon a Chinaman for a writ of Habeas Corpus

And now upon command of the complaint filed herein it is Ordered that the writ heretofor be issued to E Delany as Marshall of Walla Walla City requiring him to present the body of the said Ah Chon before me at the Court House at 2PM on the 2 day of April 1869 and that the said writ be delivered to the sheriff & be herein according to law
